Searchable tables of the Gleditsch & Ward and COW lists of independent states. For something similar in R, see [sfind()](.../reference/sfind.html).

```{r setup}
library(states)
library(DT)
```

## G&W

```{r}
data(gwstates)
datatable(gwstates)
```

## COW

```{r}
data(cowstates)
datatable(cowstates)
```
